topic.title: Deploy Yeastar Cloud PBX on Microsoft Azure

ul.li:
SBC has two ethernet ports, WAN interface is created on Microsoft Azure, LAN interface is a virtual ethernet to communicate with YMP LAN ports.
Yeastar will add SBC LAN interface when installing Yeastar Cloud PBX.
SBC WAN can receive data from the Internet and send data to the Internet.
SBC Virtual Machine acts as a gateway. The YMP will initiate outbound connections to the Internet through the SBC gateway.
